name: @acrolinx/sidebar-startpage
description: A Container Component for Acrolinx Integrations that loads the Acrolinx sidebar

scripts.dev: npm run prepareDev && concurrently --kill-others -r 'npm run lessWatch' 'npm run tscWatch' 'npm run watchify' 'npm run browsersync'
scripts.prepareDev: shx mkdir -p app/scripts && npm run less
scripts.test: npm run testNodeJS && npm run testKarmaChromeHeadless
scripts.clean: shx rm -rf tmp && shx rm -rf app/scripts && shx rm -rf dist
scripts.buildDistButNotNPM: shx rm -rf tmp/dist && shx mkdir -p app/scripts && npm run generateTranslationsTs && npm run lint && tsc && npm run injectVersion && npm run test && npm run browserify && npm run less && shx mkdir -p tmp && shx cp -r app tmp/dist && hashcat tmp/dist/index.html && npm run buildOfflineDist && npm run buildInlined
scripts.buildDistWithNPMLinuxOnly: shx rm -rf tmp/dist && shx mkdir -p app/scripts && npm run generateTranslationsTs && npm run lint && tsc && npm run injectVersion && npm run test && npm run browserify && npm run less && shx mkdir -p tmp && shx cp -r app tmp/dist && hashcat tmp/dist/index.html && npm run buildOfflineDist && npm run buildInlined && npm run buildNpmDistLinuxOnly
scripts.buildNpmDistLinuxOnly: shx mkdir -p dist && shx cp -R tmp/dist-offline/ dist && npm run createNpmDistFilesIndexLinuxOnly && npm run copyInlinedToNpmDist
scripts.copyInlinedToNpmDist: shx cp tmp/sidebar-startpage-inlined.js dist/index.js && shx cp tools/dist/index.d.ts dist/
scripts.buildOfflineDist: shx rm -rf tmp/dist-offline && shx cp -r app tmp/dist-offline && npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-offline/styles
scripts.buildInlined: shx rm -rf tmp/dist-inlined && shx cp -r app tmp/dist-inlined && hashcat tmp/dist-inlined/index.html && npm run inline && npm run packInlined
scripts.inline: npm run inlineSvg ./tmp/dist-inlined/styles && cd tmp/dist-inlined && shx cat index.html |inliner >../dist-inlined.html

author: Acrolinx

// devDependencies comments.sinon: Newer versions (6.1.3) caused problems in test build for IE11
// devDependencies comments.preact: This is the only package that is build into the final startpage code.
